member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Algorith of finding time to reach the current population level.
member.exception: Throw when initialPopulation or percent or visitors are less than 0 or equal 0.
Throw then percent is greater than 100 or less than 0.
member.returns: Time to reach the current population level.
